g.text: Obtain the list of the Trusted PID/(Q)EAA Providers
confirm the selection of PID/(Q)EAA Provider
Check PID/(Q)EAA Provider is part of the Federation and obtain its metadata
create PKCE code verifier and WIA-PoP
with OAuth-Client-Attestation and OAuth-Client-Attestation-PoP in the Header
Check Wallet Provider is part of the Federation
Check signature of the Wallet Attestation and its validity
user authentication with national eIDAS notified Schemes and consent
user authentication with PID and consent
generate DPoP proof and WIA-PoP for PID/(Q)EAA Provider token endpoint
with OAuth-Client-Attestation and OAuth-Client-Attestation-PoP in the Header
Token Response (access_token, token_type, expires_in, c_nonce, c_nonce_expires_in)
create DPoP proof for PID/(Q)EAA Provider credential endpoint
Credential Request with DPoP access_token and DPoP proof (credential_definition, format, proof)
Credential Response (format, credential, c_nonce, c_nonce_expires_in, notification_id)
The Wallet Instance, after an amount of time specified by lead_time and when triggered by the User, starts the flow again
